Articles.Content:
nodes doesn't work

This addon is not updated, at least until the Buran made.

One suggestion, could you make the manipulator arms surface attachable as well as node attachment. This would allow it to be used seperatly on other crafts which would be nice.

Also, as part of the manipulator's control system (however you do it), I suggest a 'Return' button, that automatically returna the arm to its stowed position, and the ability to save a position, so you can pit the arm back to a previous position (such as on a station or spacecraft) with only a click of a button

One suggestion, could you make the manipulator arms surface attachable as well as node attachment. This would allow it to be used seperatly on other crafts which would be nice.

Also, as part of the manipulator's control system (however you do it), I suggest a 'Return' button, that automatically returna the arm to its stowed position, and the ability to save a position, so you can pit the arm back to a previous position (such as on a station or spacecraft) with only a click of a button

uh, you write on the wrong subject?)
really looking forward for next updates keep up the good work!

Oh yeeeeeeees! Finally!
ok, downloading and flying when I get home! Finally!
Having issues putting this together is there a craft file i cant seem to get the nodes to connect

Try now download, why not download updated, now has to be right, I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

Yes craft file included in the add-on
subscribed, and waiting for the RO patch :D
support RO?

what an amazing mod, I love the buran, thanks for this!
hm...just realized, need to build the space station: Mir for this. I presume this is compatible with those parts, right?

[quote name='MoNsTroo']support RO?[/QUOTE]

from the OP:

[quote name='DECQ']RO cfg almost ready, although need to wait until it is updated.[/QUOTE]

until then use a Proton (I know four: DennyTX's, Raidernick's, Bobcat's and InsaneDruid's, they all have RO configs) to get the station waiting for Buran, like the rooskies did :P
I just was not able to download the RO 1.0.5, he always hung on almost every part of,it runs on 1.0.5 ???

[quote name='DECQ']I just was not able to download the RO 1.0.5, he always hung on almost every part of,it runs on 1.0.5 ???[/QUOTE]

No, they are working on it though

do you still have a 1.0.4 copy on your PC? if you do then that one is the one you should use for RO

btw, ModuleRCSFX isn't in RO anymore, the stock 1.0.5 ModuleRCS already does the job
Would you consider adding payloads for Buran, like the Raduga geo comm sat (first Russian geo comm sat, used for military communications).

[quote name='JoseEduardo']No, they are working on it though

do you still have a 1.0.4 copy on your PC? if you do then that one is the one you should use for RO

btw, ModuleRCSFX isn't in RO anymore, the stock 1.0.5 ModuleRCS already does the job[/QUOTE]

I have no 1.0.4 Unfortunately, the full potential of the rocket will be revealed only in the RSS / RO, the lateral position of the payload works wonders. By the way, I have the raw cfg and will wait for a new version of RO. Yes, version 1.0.5 is very good, I think one of the best.

By the way, work on an early version of the space shuttle is his name OS120, although it will not be an exact replica of a real prototype but the main part is done.

I would be glad if you personalize it. :) Since I changed it thinking that because it is not loaded KSP, as many details have been renamed.
did you loose your patch? if so, right now I'm fixing some RO SSTU configs, If I have some time left I'll try to put a RO patch for Buran together, if not today, tomorrow then

[quote name='JoseEduardo']did you loose your patch? if so, right now I'm fixing some RO SSTU configs, If I have some time left I'll try to put a RO patch for Buran together, if not today, tomorrow then[/QUOTE]

No, I have not lost it, just it is necessary to alter the path to the file, I put them is not correct, and i changed position RD_0120 engine, do not know how it will work for 1.0.5. I can send it to you PM.

[quote name='DECQ']No, I have not lost it, just it is necessary to alter the path to the file, I put them is not correct, and i changed position RD_0120 engine, do not know how it will work for 1.0.5. I can send it to you PM.[/QUOTE]

sure, send it through PM, if it works under 1.0.4 it is very likely to work under 1.0.5
just downloaded it, ill see if it functions aerodynamically in 1.04 as thats the version I'm using.

I have tested it in 1.0.4.
First problem is that craft-file didn`t work. It shows an error "not compatible". The next is that there are single parts for the manipulator and a one-piece-manipulator. The one-piece-manipulator is too long for the Buran. The End-Part stack into the Aft-Section of Buran.
The Decouplers can fit radially to the tank and you can fit the Buran to it. But optically it don`t fit. Theres a gap between the decoupler and the Buran.
When I fit the Dual-Boosters the right one is OK but the left one is a little bit away from the central tank. so i must adjust it manually.
In flight the Buran is a little bit nose-heavy and a the steering is very nervous.
